title: Musk v. MAGA: Fight erupts over Trump skilled worker immigration plans
shortDescription: The battle playing out on X, the MAGA public square, has gone viral and turned personal over Musk's describing US workers as not 'super motivated'

title: Trump says he can 'save' TikTok, urges Supreme Court to pause ban
shortDescription: Trump told the Supreme Court he can negotiate a solution to the legal battle over TikTok's survival in the United States.

title: Trump said US, Italy's heritage stems from ancient Rome | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump spoke of a "shared cultural and political heritage" that dates back to ancient Rome in a 2019 news conference with the Italian president.

title: White House says 'early indications' point to Russia in plane crash
shortDescription: The White House said Friday there were "early indications" that Russian air defenses downed an Azerbaijan Airlines flight in Kazakhstan.

title: Who has donated to Trump's inaugural fund?
shortDescription: Ford, Amazon and Meta are among some of the biggest companies donating to Donald Trump's inaugural fund.

title: Post passes satire about Trump, Greenland as real | Fact check
shortDescription: The passages in the post were taken from a satirical New Yorker piece published in 2019 when Trump first suggested the U.S. should acquire Greenland.

title: White House: Crackdown needed on US telecoms after massive China hack
shortDescription: The White House urged the FCC to force U.S. telecoms to improve security after nine were breached in the "Salt Typhoon" Chinese hacking campaign.

title: Guatemala open to accepting Trump's deportees | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus, why a center for coordinating U.S. efforts to counter foreign disinformation shut down. Sources say Russia downed a plane, killing dozens.

title: GOP opposition shutters US center to fight China and Russia propaganda
shortDescription: The center called out Moscow and Beijing for global disinformation efforts. But the pro-Trump GOP said it became politicized.

title: ICE no ha admitido que Biden liberó 68,000 migrantes | Hechos
shortDescription: Según el Reporte Anual de ICE publicado el 19 de diciembre de 2024, se deportaron 271,484 inmigrantes durante el último año fiscal.

title: No, Trump didn't tell Elon Musk to 'stay in your lane' | Fact check
shortDescription: No such post appears on Trump's Truth Social account, nor are there reports from legitimate news outlets about Trump making the comment.

title: Guatemala may take Trump deportees, sources say
shortDescription: Guatemala has been proactive in preparing for a second Trump term compared with neighbors El Salvador and Honduras.

title: Trump picks ambassador to Panama, knocks country in Christmas message
shortDescription: The announcement of his pick for ambassador comes after Trump threatened to reassert U.S. control over the Panama Canal.

title: Trial for suspect in second Trump assassination attempt delayed
shortDescription: A U.S. judge on Monday delayed a trial for the suspect in the second assassination attempt of President-elect Donald Trump until September 2025.

title: Trump wants to buy Greenland but what territories has the US purchased?
shortDescription: From the Louisiana Purchase to annexing Hawaii, a look at how the US acquired territories and states.

title: Biden signs law that will force colleges to report hazing
shortDescription: Among the dozens of bills President Joe Biden signed on Christmas Eve was the Stop Campus Hazing Act.

title: What we know: Biden's legacy
shortDescription: Three political reporters share what Joe Biden's presidential legacy will be - including his biggest lasting downfall.

title: Bill Clinton released from hospital after flu treatment, aide says
shortDescription: Former President Bill Clinton was released from the hospital on Tuesday, one day after he was admitted. An aide said he was treated for the flu.

title: Legal experts: Trump fraud suit against Register has shaky foundation
shortDescription: The president-elect's use of a state consumer fraud statute against the Des Moines Register for a poll that missed the mark is a stretch, experts say

title: Biden faces backlash for commuting sentences of 37 death row inmates
shortDescription: President Joe Biden's decision to commute the sentences of 37 death row inmates ignited a fierce debate about the morality of executions.

title: Pay increase for federal employees after Biden signs executive order
shortDescription: On Monday, President Joe Biden signed an executive order that will give most federal employees a 2% increase starting January 2025.

title: Why did the House Ethics Committee release its report on Matt Gaetz?
shortDescription: The committee rarely releases reports on members once they've resigned, but it has happened before.

title: Bill Clinton hospitalized with fever, aide says he's in 'good spirits'
shortDescription: Former President Bill Clinton was hospitalized “for testing and observation after developing a fever," his aide said Monday.

title: Ford donates $1 million, fleet of vehicles for Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: The automaker will give $1 million to Trump's inauguration festivities. Other companies including Amazon and Meta have also donated millions.
